name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Allan S. EWING, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Allan S. EWING, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Allan S. Ewing, in pro. per.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Hugh Burns, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
560 A.2d 145
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Allan S. EWING, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 5, 1988.
Decided June 27, 1989.
Allan S. Ewing, in pro. per.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Hugh Burns, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
